title: Can I give CBSE improvement in 6 subjects? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Yes, you can give the improvement exam for 6 subject CBSE only if you allowed and meet all criteria set by the CBSE then you can give the examination otherwise you can not give it. So just visit CBSE or contact them and ask them whether you can appear for CBSE 6 subject examinaiton. Feel free to contact me.
